details: Best Buy has the Apple Macbook Air 13.3

details:
eBay with Mobile Pros 1 has the refurbished Apple iPad Air 2 64GB Wi-Fi 9.7" Retina Tablet, Fall 2014 model (Gold, Gray, or Silver) for $360 with free shipping. Features up to 10 hours of battery life.

  • A8X Triple-Core 1.5GHz CPU, 64GB storage, iOS 8.1
  • 9.7" 1536x2048 IPS LCD, 8MP camera, 1080p video
title: Apple iPad Air 2 64GB 9.7" Retina Tablet

details:
Ends 4/25. eBay with Best Buy has the Samsung Chromebook 2 Bay Trail Dual-Core 11.6" Laptop (Metallic Silver, XE500C12-K02US) on sale for $179 with free shipping. Same price on Amazon (and also directly from Best Buy).

  • Intel Celeron N2840 2.16GHz, 4GB DDR3L, 16GB eMMC
  • 11.6" matte (1366x768), 802.11ac, BT 4.0, microSD, Chrome OS
title: Samsung Chromebook 2 Dual-Core 4GB RAM 11.6" Laptop

details:
HP has the HP Pavilion 15z 6th Generation Carrizo-L AMD Quad-Core 15.6" Laptop (Natural Silver) for $370 - $10 off with Natural Silver color - $15 off with code HPSAVE15 [Exp 10/31] = $345 with free shipping. Measures 0.99" thin and weighs 5.07 lbs. Windows 10 Home (64-bit) installed.

  • AMD A8-7410 1.6GHz Quad-Core, 8GB DDR3L, 1TB HDD
  • AMD Radeon R5 graphics, 15.6" LED (1366x768), 802.11b/g/n
title: HP Pavilion 15z AMD Quad-Core 15.6" 8GB Laptop

details:
Newegg has the MSI GP62 Leopard Pro-002 5th Generation Core i7 Full HD 15.6" Gaming Laptop (Black, 9S7-16J312-002) for $799 - $40 off with code EMCETGH24 [Exp 4/24] - $70 rebate [Exp 4/24] = $689 with free shipping.

title: MSI GP62 Leopard Pro-002 Core i7 15.6" Gaming Laptop
